ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Making platinum?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Chris, I learned to make plat by selling in the bazaar. It can be long and boring but the times I m not playing, which is quite a lot, I sell. I sell stuff
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Chris,
I learned to make plat by selling in the bazaar. It can be long and boring but the times I'm not playing, which is quite a lot, I sell. I sell stuff I looted, pages, runes, meats,a big money bringer is rockhopper hides. Flawless brings in 345 plat per hide on my server. When I upgrade my armour I sell off my old stuff. I now have over 31,000 plat believe it or not just from selling in 2 weeks time. I hope this helps you.
donna
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Talbot
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 01, 2003 12:53 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Making platinum?

Hi, everyone.

I've only been playing EQ a few months, and I have a ranger on Tarew Marr
who has just made 12th level and a warrior who's at 3rd level. I keep
looking for strategies for each character all over the Web, but one thing
eludes me. Of course, that's making platinum. I keep seeing all these books
for sale on how to make platinum easily and quickly, but I keep writing them
off as scams. Are there any half-decent methods for growing wealthier?

Chris
